1.name: Pagliacci Pizza
1.description: Classic Italian pizzas with great ingredients, friendly staff and good service. Available by the slice or pie. Click for Menu! Rating 👍👍👍👍👍

2.name: Pogacha
2.description: Absolutely delicious bread 'pogachas' - fresh from the oven!  Almost everything I've had there is delicious especially, homemade soups!  Waiters are very personable 😊 and great little outdoor patio area, where you can bring your dog. Click for location and order online!  Rating 👍👍👍👍👍

3.name: Just Poke Mercer Island
3.description: Just good poke. Always tastes fresh, a good selection of sauces, and I appreciate that they mix your protein with your choice of sauce(s). Click for Menu! Rating 👍👍👍👍👍

1.name: Barrels Wine Bar
1.description: This is just the coolest place on the Island. It's great for gathering small groups of friends to sample wine and enjoy the small bites. It makes me happy just thinking about it! Click for Menu! Rating 👍👍👍👍👍

2.name: Shawn's Cafe   Bakery
2.description: Super nice people here who gave me that energy boost that I needed with a fig jam and goat cheese panini and a pretzel roll with sweet mustard dip. Click for Menu! Rating 👍👍👍👍👍

3.name: Mioposto Pizzeria
3.description: Authentic Italian food with a decent selection of beer and drinks. Tasty, fresh pizza, nice patio seating, super friendly service. Click for Menu! Rating 👍👍👍👍👍

1.name: Luther Burbank Park
1.description: Nice playground for younger and older kids, they have a play area for dogs, nice sand beach area. You can go for a long walk. They have plenty of parking space. Many people like fishing, biking, playing ball, and going for a run. There are picnic tables for birthday parties.

2.name: Mercer Island Thrift Shop
2.description: My only wish is that I was able to stay longer! The staff were kind and able to store my friend's and my bags while we browsed the store. Additionally, the prices make really nice clothing and accessories insanely affordable.

3.name: Bicentennial Park
3.description: I loved this place! I felt like I was a monk on the steps 🧙‍♂️. I recommend it to everyone.
